description: A React component implementing a contact form with client-side validation and simulated submission, including form input validation, error handling, and success feedback.

methods.name: ContactForm
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the contact form, handling state and submission logic.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handler function invoked on form submission; performs validation and manages form state.

methods.name: Input
methods.description: Inner functional component for rendering labeled input fields with validation display.
